rules.description: Ctrl+(Shift)+Right/left arrow => Alt+(Shift)+Right/left arrow (Move cursor one word with selection and without selection)
Map Control + C/D to stop execution / EOF in term (ala Linux)
Map Control_Shift + C/V to copy/paste in term (ala Linux)
Fn+C, Fn+V, Fn+X => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste), Cmd+X (Cut)
